select A.TS_OrderNo, A.TS_ItemCode, C.Product_Item_Name TS_ItemName, C.Product_Info_STND_1 TS_Item_STND_1, C.Product_Info_STND_2 TS_Item_STND_2, A.TS_Qty, A.TS_Unit_Price, D.Child_TBL_Type TS_Unit, A.TS_Price, A.TS_Client_Code, B.Cus_Name TS_Client_Name, A.TS_Date, A.TS_Classfy, E.Child_TBL_Type TS_Classfy_Name, F.Order_lInfo_Remark InMat_Info_Remark, A.TS_Insert_Time, A.TS_Modifier from Temporary_Storage_tbl A inner join Customer_tbl B on A.TS_Client_Code = B.Cus_Code inner join Product_Info_tbl C on A.TS_ItemCode = C.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE inner join DTL_TBL D on C.PRODUCT_UNIT = D.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join DTL_TBL E on A.TS_Classfy = E.CHILD_TBL_NO inner join OrderList_tbl F on A.TS_OrderNo = F.Order_lCus_No and A.TS_ItemCode = F.Order_lCode
where A.TS_Date >= #{startDate} and A.TS_Date < #{endDate}
and A.TS_ItemCode like concat('%',#{ItemCode},'%') and A.TS_Client_Code like concat('%',#{ClientCode},'%')
and A.TS_Classfy = #{ItemSendClsfc}
and A.TS_Status = 'N'
and A.TS_Status = 'Y'
order by A.TS_Date
